00078 class BRISA_UPNP_EXPORT BrisaServiceParserContext
00079 {
00080     public:
00081         BrisaServiceParserContext(BrisaServiceParserContext *parent = 0,
00082                                   BrisaAbstractService *target = 0)
00083             : stateSkip(0), state(Scpd), parent(parent), service(target), action(0), stateVariable(0),
00084             argument(0) {}
00085 
00086         BrisaAction *getAction(void) { return action; }
00087         BrisaAbstractService *getService(void) { return service; }
00088         BrisaStateVariable *getStateVariable(void) { return stateVariable; }
00089         BrisaArgument *getArgument(void) { return argument; }
00090 
00091         void setAction(BrisaAction *action) { this->action = action; }
00092         void setService(BrisaAbstractService *service) { this->service = service; }
00093         void setStateVariable(BrisaStateVariable *stateVariable) { this->stateVariable = stateVariable; }
00094         void setArgument(BrisaArgument *argument) { this->argument = argument; }
00095 
00096         bool hasParent(void) { return (parent != 0); }
00097         BrisaServiceParserContext *getParent(void) { return parent; }
00098 
00099         int stateSkip;
00100         saxParserState state;
00101 
00102     private:
00103         BrisaServiceParserContext *parent;
00104         BrisaAbstractService *service;
00105         BrisaAction *action;
00106         BrisaStateVariable *stateVariable;
00107         BrisaArgument *argument;
00108 };
